mapper.select:
SELECT OMO.MENU_CD , OMO.MENU_NM , OMO_1.MENU_CD AS SUB_CATEGORY_ID , OMO_1.MENU_NM AS SUB_CATEGORY , OMO_2.MENU_CD AS MAIN_CATEGORY_ID , OMO_2.MENU_NM AS MAIN_CATEGORY , CASE WHEN OMO.MENU_TYPE = '1' THEN '킹오더 > ' ELSE '딜리버리 > ' END AS MENU_TYPE FROM OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO_1 ON OMO.UP_MENU_CD = OMO_1.MENU_CD AND OMO_1.DEPTH = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO_2 ON OMO_1.UP_MENU_CD = OMO_2.MENU_CD AND OMO_2.DEPTH = 1 WHERE OMO.DEPTH = 3 AND OMO.USE_YN = 1
AND (OMO.MENU_NM LIKE '%'||#{MENU_NAME}||'%' /* 메뉴명 */ OR OMO.MENU_CD LIKE '%'||#{MENU_NAME}||'%')
ORDER BY OMO.MENU_TYPE DESC, OMO.MENU_NM ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT CRMADMIN.SEQ_TBS_STAMP.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP ( NO_STAMP /* 스템프일련번호 */ , TP_SET /* 설정구분(기본,이벤트) */ , DS_TITLE /* 제목 */ , DT_APPLY_START /* 적용시작기간 */ , DT_APPLY_END /* 적용종료기간 */ , FG_DEL /* 삭제여부 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ , FG_USE ) VALUES ( #{NO_STAMP} /* 스템프일련번호 */ , '02' /* 설정구분(기본,이벤트) */ , #{DS_TITLE} /* 제목 */ , TO_DATE(#{DT_APPLY_START},'YYYY-MM-DD') /* 적용시작기간 */ , TO_DATE(#{DT_APPLY_END} || ' 235959','YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') /* 적용종료기간 */ , 'N' /* 삭제여부 */ , SYSDATE /* 최초등록일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 최초등록자 */ , SYSDATE /* 최근수정일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 최근수정자 */ , #{FG_USE_MAIN} )

INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_ROLE ( NO_STAMP /* 스템프일련번 */ , ID_MENU /* 상품ID */ , CD_GRADE /* 회원등급코드 */ , NM_MENU /* 상품명 */ , CNT_ACCML /* 적립갯수 */ , FG_USE /* 사용여부 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */
) VALUES ( #{NO_STAMP} /* 스템프일련번 */ , #{CD_MENU} /* 상품ID */ , #{CD_GRADE} /* 회원등급코드 */ , #{NM_MENU} /* 상품명 */ , #{CNT_ACCML} /* 적립갯수 */ , #{FG_USE} /* 사용여부 */ , SYSDATE /* 최초등록일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 최초등록자 */ , SYSDATE /* 최근수정일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 최근수정자 */ )

INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_STND ( NO_STAMP /*스템프일련번호 */ , CD_MTH_PURCHS /*구매방법코드 */ , CD_ORDER_CHNN /*주문채널구분코드 */
) VALUES ( #{NO_STAMP} /*스템프일련번호 */ , #{CD_MTH_PURCHS} /*구매방법코드 */ , #{CD_ORDER_CHNN} /*주문채널구분코드 */ )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TS.TP_SET = '01' THEN '기본' ELSE '이벤트' END AS TP_SET , TS.DS_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_APPLY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPLY_START , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_APPLY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPLY_END , TS.FG_DEL , TS.FG_USE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP TS WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP}

SELECT DISTINCT TSR.ID_MENU , TSR.NM_MENU AS NM_MENU , '' AS SUB , '' AS MAIN , TSR.CD_GRADE , TSR.CD_GRADE AS NM_GRADE , TSR.CNT_ACCML , TSR.FG_USE , TSR.CD_GRADE ||'/'|| TSR.ID_MENU ||'/'|| TSR.NM_MENU ||'/'|| TSR.CNT_ACCML ||'/'|| TSR.FG_USE AS STR_MENU FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_ROLE TSR WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP} ORDER BY NM_MENU ASC

SELECT NO_STAMP_RECODE , DS_TITLE , CASE WHEN TP_SET = '01' THEN '기본' ELSE '이벤트' END AS TP_SET , TO_CHAR(DT_APPLY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(DT_APPLY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPLY , TO_CHAR(DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER , SU.USER_NM AS NM_UPT_USER , TSR.FG_USE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_RECODE TSR LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TSR.ID_UPT_USER WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP} ORDER BY DT_UPT DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_STND_RECODE ( NO_STAMP_RECODE , NO_STAMP , CD_MTH_PURCHS , CD_ORDER_CHNN
) SELECT #{NO_STAMP_RECODE} , NO_STAMP , CD_MTH_PURCHS , CD_ORDER_CHNN FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_STND WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP}

INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_ROLE_RECODE ( NO_STAMP_RECODE , NO_STAMP , ID_MENU , CD_GRADE , NM_MENU , CNT_ACCML , FG_USE , DT_REG , ID_REG_USER , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER
) SELECT #{NO_STAMP_RECODE} , NO_STAMP , ID_MENU , CD_GRADE , NM_MENU , CNT_ACCML , FG_USE , DT_REG , ID_REG_USER , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_ROLE WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP}

INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_EXCEPT_STORE_RECODE ( NO_STAMP_RECODE , NO_STAMP , NO_STAMP_EXCEPT_STORE , ID_STORE , NM_STORE , DT_REG , ID_REG_USER , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER
) SELECT #{NO_STAMP_RECODE} , NO_STAMP , NO_STAMP_EXCEPT_STORE , ID_STORE , NM_STORE , DT_REG , ID_REG_USER , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_EXCEPT_STORE WHERE NO_STAMP = #{NO_STAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TS.TP_SET = '01' THEN '기본' ELSE '이벤트' END AS TP_SET , TS.DS_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_APPLY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPLY_START , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_APPLY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_APPLY_END , REGSU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_USER , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG , UPDSU.USER_NM AS NM_UPT_USER , TO_CHAR(TS.DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT , TS.FG_DEL FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_RECODE TS LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_USER REGSU ON REGSU.USER_ID = TS.ID_REG_USER LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_USER UPDSU ON UPDSU.USER_ID = TS.ID_UPT_USER WHERE NO_STAMP_RECODE = #{NO_STAMP_RECODE}

SELECT DISTINCT TSR.ID_MENU , CASE WHEN NVL(OMO.MENU_TYPE, MAIN2.MENU_TYPE) = '2' THEN '(딜리버리) ' WHEN NVL(OMO.MENU_TYPE, MAIN2.MENU_TYPE) = '1' THEN '(킹오더) ' ELSE '(데이터 없음) ' END || TSR.NM_MENU AS NM_MENU , NVL(SUB.MENU_CD, TSR.ID_MENU) AS SUB , NVL(MAIN.MENU_CD, MAIN2.MENU_CD) AS MAIN , TSR.CD_GRADE , TSR.CD_GRADE AS NM_GRADE , TSR.CNT_ACCML , TSR.FG_USE , TSR.CD_GRADE ||'/'|| TSR.ID_MENU ||'/'|| TSR.NM_MENU ||'/'|| TSR.CNT_ACCML ||'/'|| TSR.FG_USE AS STR_MENU FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_ROLE_RECODE TSR LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO ON OMO.MENU_CD = TSR.ID_MENU AND OMO.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND OMO.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND OMO.USE_YN = '1' AND OMO.DEPTH = 3 LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG SUB ON SUB.MENU_CD = OMO.UP_MENU_CD AND SUB.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND SUB.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND SUB.USE_YN = '1' AND SUB.DEPTH = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG MAIN ON MAIN.MENU_CD = SUB.UP_MENU_CD AND MAIN.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MAIN.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MAIN.USE_YN = '1' AND MAIN.UP_MENU_CD != MAIN.MENU_CD AND MAIN.DEPTH = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG SUB2 ON SUB.MENU_CD IS NULL AND SUB2.MENU_CD = TSR.ID_MENU AND SUB2.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND SUB2.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND SUB2.USE_YN = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG MAIN2 ON MAIN2.MENU_CD = SUB2.UP_MENU_CD AND MAIN2.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MAIN2.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MAIN2.USE_YN = '1' WHERE NO_STAMP_RECODE = #{NO_STAMP_RECODE} ORDER BY NM_MENU ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_REWARD SET FG_USE = 'N' , DT_UPT = SYSDATE , ID_UPT_USER = #{user.id}
mapper.select: SELECT TSR.CNT_STAMP_REWARD , TSR.CD_COUPON , TSR.NM_COUPON , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||' ~ '|| TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY , TSR.ORDER_NO , TSR.CD_COUPON ||'/'||TSR.NM_COUPON AS STR_COUPON FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_REWARD TSR LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON TC ON TC.CD_COUPON = TSR.CD_COUPON WHERE TSR.FG_USE = 'Y' ORDER BY TSR.ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT OMO1.MENU_CD AS MAIN , OMO1.MENU_NM AS MAIN_NM , OMO2.MENU_CD AS SUB , OMO2.MENU_NM AS SUB_NM FROM OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO3 INNER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO2 ON OMO2.MENU_CD = OMO3.UP_MENU_CD AND OMO2.DEPTH = 2 INNER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_ORG OMO1 ON OMO1.MENU_CD = OMO2.UP_MENU_CD AND OMO1.DEPTH = 1 WHERE OMO3.MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD} AND OMO3.DEPTH = 3
